description:
Made with a sustainable fabric blend of organic cotton and hemp, we’re digging the naturally soft and earthy feel of our Drayton Long Sleeve - Slim.

It's the ultimate work shirt for men, giving your weekly wardrobe a major style upgrade thanks to a modern slim fit that always looks put together.

And thanks to the lightweight fabric, this is a style built for all seasons. Wear it on it’s own during warmer months, or layed up under a sweater or jacket when things cool down.
name: Prana Drayton LS - Slim - Mens
